items.name: Starlight Chalice
explicitMods: Inflict Fire, Cold and Lightning Exposure on nearby Enemies when used
30% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments you inflict during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Uhtred and his priests drank of the skies
to empower runes... and themselves.

items.name: Graven's Secret
explicitMods: Modifiers to Minimum Power Charges instead apply to Minimum Absorption Charges
Maximum Absorption Charges is equal to Maximum Power Charges
Gain Absorption Charges instead of Power Charges
flavourText: The cowardly thinker's greatest success is simply surviving.

items.name: Anathema
explicitMods: 10% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

items.typeLine: Enduring Divine Mana Flask of Sealing
explicitMods:
Effect is not removed when Unreserved Mana is Filled
Effect does not Queue

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 6 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 6 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Defiance of Destiny
explicitMods: Gain 33% of Missing Unreserved Life before being Hit by an Enemy
flavourText: The farmer was struck again and again, but he refused to stay down.
Astonished, the raiding warlord ordered the man's family spared.

items.name: Atziri's Reflection
flavourText: "At last, my beauty is beyond reproach."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a portal to the current area's town.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills which throw mines.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 5% increased Mine Throwing Speed
Supported Skills can have up to 3 additional Remote Mines placed at a time
Supported Skills throw up to 4 additional Mines
Supported Skills have 46% less Mine Throwing Speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a mine that will use the skill for you when you detonate it. Mines cannot use channelling skills.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Supported Skills gain a Base Reservation equal to Base Mana and Life Cost
Supported Skills have a Base Mine Detonation Time of 0.25 seconds
Each Mine from Supported Skills applies 2% chance to deal Double Damage to Hits against Enemies near it, up to a maximum of 100%
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Gale Hand
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Duration Gems
+2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports hex curse skills, turning them into auras that will apply their effect to all enemies in an area around you.
explicitMods:
Supported Curse Skills apply their Curses as Auras
Supported Curse Skills also count as Aura Skills
108% increased Area of Effect of Supported Curse Skills
+1 to Level of Supported Curse Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.
explicitMods: 50% less Effect of Curse against Players
Cursed Normal and Magic Enemies have 30% less Action Speed
Other effects on Cursed enemies expire 25% slower
Cursed Rare and Unique Enemies have 19% less Action Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 30% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 19% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.

20% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Cursed enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 217 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 40% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 88% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 100% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 623 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 82 Mana when Killed
Cursed Enemies have a 5% chance to grant a Power Charge when Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Aurumvorax
flavourText: Many a collector of rarities discovered to his dismay
that the intelligent spirit in this sword
does not like to share its master's attention

Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect

socketedItems.secDescrText:
Supports skills with cooldowns.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a mine that will teleport you to it when detonated. It covers both your escape and arrival with a cloud of smoke that blinds enemies, and gives you a temporary buff to movement speed. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Mine Duration also apply to this Skill's Buff Duration
Only one Mine of this type can Detonate in each Detonation Sequence

fracturedMods: 11% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% reduced Mana Cost

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.
